extended_tweet.full_text:
This is an ABG of a #Covid_19 patient with severe respiratory failure.
A normal P/F ratio is >300.
Respiratory failure is defined with a P/F <200.
Here is 28, and the patient is ventilated with 100% oxygen.

Please #StayAtHome, we can use tubes and ventilators, not magic wands! https://t.co/rjMcqS8XCe
